questions:
What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A window
B) A fireplace and a ceramic pot
C) A piece of furniture
D) A painting

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A large window
B) A brick fireplace
C) A wooden table
D) A bookshelf

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A carpet
B) A wooden floor
C) A garden
D) A tiled floor

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A cityscape
B) Wooden walls
C) A forest
D) A mountain range

What object is placed inside the fireplace?
A) A book
B) A ceramic pot
C) A candle
D) A plant

What material is the fireplace made of?
A) Wood
B) Metal
C) Brick
D) Bricks and concrete

What is the condition of the brickwork in the fireplace?
A) Pristine and new
B) Worn and aged
C) Broken and damaged
D) Recently painted

What type of flooring is visible in the photo?
A) Carpeted
B) Wooden planks
C) Marble
D) Concrete

What is the color of the ceramic pot in the fireplace?
A) Blue
B) White
C) Black
D) Red

What is the texture of the walls surrounding the fireplace?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Glossy
D) Metallic

What is the orientation of the bricks in the fireplace?
A) Vertical
B) Horizontal
C) Diagonal
D) Circular

What is the shape of the fireplace opening?
A) Circular
B) Rectangular
C) Arched
D) Triangular

What is the condition of the wooden floor?
A) New and polished
B) Old and worn
C) Painted and clean
D) Broken and damaged

How many handles does the ceramic pot have?
A) None
B) One/two
C) Two
D) Three

What is the predominant color of the bricks?
A) Red
B) White
C) Grey
D) Brown

What is the texture of the ceramic pot?
A) Smooth and shiny
B) Rough and matte
C) Glossy and reflective
D) Patterned and textured

What is the alignment of the bricks on the floor in front of the fireplace?
A) Random
B) Patterned
C) Stacked
D) Interlocked

What kind of brick pattern is used in the fireplace construction?
A) Running bond
B) Flemish bond
C) Stack bond
D) Herringbone

What kind of lighting is present in the room?
A) Natural sunlight
B) Artificial lighting
C) Candlelight
D) No visible lighting

What is the color of the wooden floor?
A) Light brown
B) Dark brown
C) Grey
D) Black

What is the design of the fireplace opening?
A) Simple
B) Ornate
C) Modern
D) Abstract

What is the predominant material used in the room's construction?
A) Metal
B) Glass
C) Wood
D) Plastic

What is the state of the wooden floor?
A) Polished and shiny
B) Rough and unfinished
C) Covered with a rug
D) Wet and muddy
